p.k: Gumball thinks Teri is way too scared of germs. / Granny JoJo's overprotective behavior puts the Wattersons in danger. / Gumball teaches Darwin a lesson after Darwin leaves him. / Gumball asks Idaho to teach his family to live a simpler life. / Bobert loses a bet to Gumball so has to obey him for 24 hours. / Gumball and Darwin receive an heirloom from Richard but lose it. / The Wattersons run over Santa Claus and must save Christmas. / Gumball and Darwin befriend Clayton, who is a compulsive liar and begins contaminating them with lies. / For once in his life Gumball is the one who's owed an apology.
